hero.title: Captain's Log
hero.subtitle: Your modern digital logbook for relaxed sailing. Record courses, sails, weather and wind, track your route via GPS tracking and export professional PDF reports â€“ all offline-capable and multilingual.

whatIs.title: What is Captain's Log?
whatIs.description: Captain's Log is the modern solution for your maritime logbook. The web app combines traditional logbook keeping with digital technology and makes documenting your sailing trips easier than ever before.

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for professional logbook keeping

techStack.title: Technical Details
techStack.description: Fullstack Progressive Web App (PWA) built with React, TypeScript, Leaflet Maps and Lovable Cloud (Supabase). Features: Real-time GPS tracking with Geolocation API, PDF generation (pdf-lib), realtime updates, RLS-secured database, multilingual i18n support, responsive design with Tailwind CSS.
